hero.title: ProaLAB: The Most Advanced Educational Future Modeler in Latin America
hero.description: Bridging the gap between Education and Industry through Artificial Intelligence, Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning, econometric methods, and predictive forecasting.
hero.footnote: The largest private effort in Latin America and the Caribbean to transform educational trajectories.

features.title: Cutting-edge technology to model educational trajectories
features.description: Advanced tools that transform data into effective educational strategies.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Advanced algorithms that analyze educational patterns and predict optimal trajectories for each student.

nlp.title: Natural Language Processing
nlp.description: Semantic analysis of educational and labor documents to identify key competencies and training gaps.

deepLearning.title: Deep Learning
deepLearning.description: Neural networks that continuously learn from data to improve the accuracy of educational recommendations.

econometrics.title: Econometric Methods
econometrics.description: Advanced statistical models that quantify the impact of educational interventions on labor outcomes.

forecasting.title: Predictive Forecasting
forecasting.description: Projections of future labor demand to align current training with market needs.

bigData.title: Educational Big Data
bigData.description: Processing large volumes of educational and labor data to identify trends and opportunities.

products.title: Our Advanced Solutions
products.description: Cutting-edge tools to transform data into strategic decisions

simulator.title: Labor Scenarios Simulator
simulator.description: Projects the labor future based on real data and industry trends.
features: Predictive analysis of industrial sectors at the country level
Evaluation of return on investment in specific training
Identification of emerging opportunities and declining sectors
Personalized projections according to economic and social variables

relevance.title: Educational Relevance
relevance.description: Complete analysis of the relevance of all careers taught in Chile.
features: Demand strength index by career and region
Technological substitution risk analysis (Frey & Osborne methodology)
International trajectory index for each professional sector

ai.title: Proa AI
ai.description: Artificial intelligence specialized in educational and labor analysis.
features: Reduction of hallucinations through source verification
Generation of personalized reports with actionable insights
Assistance in adapting to new educational technologies

lighthouse.title: PROA Lighthouse
lighthouse.description: Free monthly technical minute with analysis of the educational and labor sector.

studies.title: Studies
studies.description: Detailed research on the educational and labor landscape.

reports.title: Methodological Reports
reports.description: Detailed documentation of our methodologies and processes.

blog.title: ProaLAB Blog
blog.description: Exploring the future of education and work

pricing.title: Plans tailored to your needs
pricing.description: Scalable solutions for educational institutions, governments, and companies.

institutional.title: Institutional
institutional.tooltip: Perfect for getting started with ProaLAB

governmental.title: Governmental
